title: Artist Ordered To Pay Museum Back $77,000 After Submitting Two Blank Canvases Literally Called ‘Take The Money And Run’
description:
I guess Danish artists are now slave workers that are no longer entitled to the fruits of their labor. At least that is what happened in Denmark when one artist submitted the most beautiful example of modern art and the museum actually had the nerve to not pay him for his work.

In 2021, Jens Haaning was given $84,000 by a museum to use in a work of art. Haaning turned in two blank canvases and pocketed the money. He titled the canvases "Take the Money and Run."

A court in Copenhagen ruled this week he has to pay at least some of it back.

— (@)

title: F35 Conspiracy Breakdown: What Really Happened to America's $100M Jet?
description:
The United States Military said that it has located the wreckage of a $100 million F-35 fighter jet that crashed over the weekend in South Carolina after a malfunction forced the pilot to eject himself from the aircraft.

There have been several conspiracy theories surrounding this issue. Today’s show breaks some of those down.

Joint Base Charleston said Sunday on social media that efforts were underway to locate the jet with the help of Marine Corps Air Station Beaufort following a “mishap” and asked for the public’s help in finding the stealth fighter.

title: Watch: Police tell father his preteen daughter, after being groomed by a predator, could be arrested for child porn
description:
I've been staring at my computer for ten minutes and don't know where to begin with this one. An Ohio father, per the ring camera footage he uploaded, was told his eleven-year-old daughter could be arrested for sharing child porn... to the groomer predator who contacted her on the communist Chinese own social media app TikTok.

Captioned on the video: "She's 11. He's a grown man. He manipulated her into sending pictures of herself. This was the police response at midnight. We called at 6."

The father called the police at 6:00. They didn't show up until midnight. The girl was asleep... because she's eleven. This is the conversation that unfolded.

title: Listen: Woke city mayor calls 911 to snitch, complain about "far-right activists" outside of a Walmart
description:
Alleged "far-right activists" were standing around outside of a Walmart and so triggered that a Washington mayor, she called 9/11 on them. No, it wasn't an emergency. Yes, she called 9/11 anyway.

Yakima Mayor Janice Deccio (she/her/hers according to a now defunct Instagram page) called 9/11 knowing it wasn't an emergency call, but needed to speak to someone anyway. "Far-right activists" were standing outside a Walmart. They were asked to leave, didn't, and police wouldn't do anything.

So Mayor Karen called herself. Turns out it was perfectly legal for these "far-right activists" to be standing outside a store collecting signatures for six statewide ballot initiatives. Yes, collecting ballot signatures. That's how you get things, be it people or initiatives, onto a ballot for election day.

title: Chris Pratt gives patriotic speech at Christian college about 9/11, makes Joe Biden skipping Ground Zero look WORSE
description:
Chris Pratt is the only A-list actor who would give a pro-America speech, speak at a Christian college, or commemorate 9/11. So it shouldn't be a surprise he did all three all at once last week. Ironically, Joey Biden also gave a notable 9/11 address, but for different reasons.

Pratt was invited to give the keynote address at Pepperdine University's. 9/11 Remembrance Ceremony. The college invited him after the actor shared a photo of Pepperdine's Waves of Flags display on his Instagram account last year.
